userMenu.title: User Menu
userMenu.description: User settings and account management menu

success.title: File saved
success.description: The file has been saved successfully

fileDialog.title: Create New Markdown File
fileDialog.description: Enter the file name. You can include a directory path (e.g., "dir/file.md").

repositoryDialog.title: Select Repository
repositoryDialog.signInRequired: Sign in required to select a repository

cloneSuccess.title: Repository cloned successfully
cloneSuccess.description: You can check files in the explorer

success.title: Pushed
success.description: Changes have been pushed to remote successfully

success.title: Pulled
success.description: Changes have been pulled from remote successfully

git.signInRequired: Please sign in to use repository features.

unsupportedFileDialog.title: Unsupported File Format
unsupportedFileDialog.description: The file {filePath} is not supported. Currently, only Markdown files (.md) are supported.

fileDeletionDialog.title: Delete {type, select, file {File} directory {Directory} other {File}}
fileDeletionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {filePath}?
fileDeletionDialog.directoryWarning: This will permanently delete the directory and all its contents.

unsavedChangesDialog.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChangesDialog.description: This file ({fileName}) has unsaved changes. Do you want to save?

git.unexpectedStatusError: An unexpected error occurred during git status
git.unexpectedAddError: An unexpected error occurred during git add
git.unexpectedResetError: An unexpected error occurred during git reset
git.unexpectedCheckoutError: An unexpected error occurred during git checkout
git.unexpectedCommitError: An unexpected error occurred during git commit
git.unexpectedLogError: An unexpected error occurred during git log
git.unexpectedPushError: An unexpected error occurred during git push
git.unexpectedPullError: An unexpected error occurred during git pull
